ViewObject.Name: XxcsoAccountForRegistLovVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT '1' application_type ,xcasv.cust_account_id ,xcasv.account_number ,xcasv.party_name ,xcasv.organization_name_phonetic ,xcasv.established_site_name ,SUBSTRB(xcasv.postal_code, 1, 3) postal_code_first ,SUBSTRB(xcasv.postal_code, 4, 4) postal_code_second ,xcasv.postal_code ,xcasv.state ,xcasv.city ,xcasv.address1 ,xcasv.address2 ,xcasv.phone_number ,xcasv.business_low_type ,xcasv.industry_div ,xcasv.establishment_location ,xcasv.open_close_div ,xcasv.employees ,xcasv.sale_base_code ,xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_base_name( xcasv.sale_base_code ,xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate ) sale_base_name ,xcasv.customer_status FROM xxcso_cust_acct_sites_v xcasv WHERE xcasv.customer_status IN ('10','20','25','30','40','50') AND xcasv.account_number IN ( SELECT xcr1.account_number FROM xxcso_cust_resources_v2 xcr1 WHERE xcr1.employee_number IN ( SELECT employee_number FROM ( SELECT xev3.employee_number FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev3 WHERE xev3.issue_date <= TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') AND xev3.work_base_code_new IN ( SELECT xx1.work_base_code FROM (SELECT xev1.work_base_code_new work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev1 WHERE xev1.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev1.issue_date <= TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') UNION ALL SELECT xev2.work_base_code_old work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev2 WHERE xev2.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev2.issue_date > TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') ) xx1 ) UNION ALL SELECT xev4.employee_number FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev4 WHERE xev4.issue_date > TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') AND xev4.work_base_code_old IN ( SELECT xx2.work_base_code FROM (SELECT xev1.work_base_code_new work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev1 WHERE xev1.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev1.issue_date <= TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') UNION ALL SELECT xev2.work_base_code_old work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev2 WHERE xev2.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev2.issue_date > TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') ) xx2 ) ) ) UNION SELECT xca2.customer_code FROM xxcmm_cust_accounts xca2 WHERE xca2.sale_base_code IN ( SELECT xx3.work_base_code FROM (SELECT xev1.work_base_code_new work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev1 WHERE xev1.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev1.issue_date <= TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') UNION ALL SELECT xev2.work_base_code_old work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev2 WHERE xev2.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev2.issue_date > TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') ) xx3 ) UNION SELECT xca3.customer_code FROM xxcmm_cust_accounts xca3 ,fnd_lookup_values_vl flv WHERE flv.lookup_type = 'XXCMM_CHAIN_CODE' AND flv.lookup_code = xca3.sales_chain_code -- 販売先チェーンコード AND flv.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND NVL(flv.start_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) <= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND NVL(flv.end_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) >= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND flv.attribute3 IN ( SELECT xx4.work_base_code FROM (SELECT xev1.work_base_code_new work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev1 WHERE xev1.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev1.issue_date <= TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') UNION ALL SELECT xev2.work_base_code_old work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev2 WHERE xev2.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev2.issue_date > TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') ) xx4 ) ) AND (xcasv.customer_class_code = '10' OR xcasv.customer_class_code IS NULL) AND (xcasv.business_low_type IS NULL OR xcasv.business_low_type IN ( SELECT flvv2.lookup_code FROM fnd_lookup_values_vl flvv1 ,fnd_lookup_values_vl flvv2 WHERE flvv1.lookup_type = 'XXCMM_CUST_GYOTAI_SHO' AND flvv1.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND NVL(flvv1.start_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) <= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND NVL(flvv1.end_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) >= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND flvv2.lookup_type = 'XXCSO1_SP_CATEGORY' AND flvv2.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND NVL(flvv2.start_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) <= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND NVL(flvv2.end_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) >= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND flvv2.lookup_code = flvv1.lookup_code ) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM po_hazard_classes_vl phcv ,po_un_numbers_vl punv ,csi_item_instances cii ,fnd_lookup_values_vl flvv WHERE phcv.hazard_class = flvv.lookup_code AND punv.hazard_class_id = phcv.hazard_class_id AND cii.attribute1 = punv.un_number AND cii.owner_party_id = xcasv.party_id AND cii.owner_party_account_id = xcasv.cust_account_id AND flvv.lookup_type = 'XXCSO1_SP_DISPLAY_KIKI_TYPE' AND flvv.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND NVL(flvv.start_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) <= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND NVL(flvv.end_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) >= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) ) UNION ALL SELECT '2' application_type ,xcasv.cust_account_id ,xcasv.account_number ,xcasv.party_name ,xcasv.organization_name_phonetic ,xcasv.established_site_name ,SUBSTRB(xcasv.postal_code, 1, 3) postal_code_first ,SUBSTRB(xcasv.postal_code, 4, 4) postal_code_second ,xcasv.postal_code ,xcasv.state ,xcasv.city ,xcasv.address1 ,xcasv.address2 ,xcasv.phone_number ,xcasv.business_low_type ,xcasv.industry_div ,xcasv.establishment_location ,xcasv.open_close_div ,xcasv.employees ,xcasv.sale_base_code ,xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_base_name( xcasv.sale_base_code ,xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate ) sale_base_name ,xcasv.customer_status FROM xxcso_cust_acct_sites_v xcasv WHERE xcasv.customer_status IN ('10','20','25','30','40','50') AND xcasv.account_number IN ( SELECT xcr1.account_number FROM xxcso_cust_resources_v2 xcr1 WHERE xcr1.employee_number IN ( SELECT employee_number FROM ( SELECT xev3.employee_number FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev3 WHERE xev3.issue_date <= TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') AND xev3.work_base_code_new IN ( SELECT xx1.work_base_code FROM (SELECT xev1.work_base_code_new work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev1 WHERE xev1.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev1.issue_date <= TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') UNION ALL SELECT xev2.work_base_code_old work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev2 WHERE xev2.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev2.issue_date > TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') ) xx1 ) UNION ALL SELECT xev4.employee_number FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev4 WHERE xev4.issue_date > TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') AND xev4.work_base_code_old IN ( SELECT xx2.work_base_code FROM (SELECT xev1.work_base_code_new work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev1 WHERE xev1.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev1.issue_date <= TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') UNION ALL SELECT xev2.work_base_code_old work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev2 WHERE xev2.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev2.issue_date > TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') ) xx2 ) ) ) UNION SELECT xca2.customer_code FROM xxcmm_cust_accounts xca2 WHERE xca2.sale_base_code IN ( SELECT xx3.work_base_code FROM (SELECT xev1.work_base_code_new work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev1 WHERE xev1.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev1.issue_date <= TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') UNION ALL SELECT xev2.work_base_code_old work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev2 WHERE xev2.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev2.issue_date > TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') ) xx3 ) UNION SELECT xca3.customer_code FROM xxcmm_cust_accounts xca3 ,fnd_lookup_values_vl flv WHERE flv.lookup_type = 'XXCMM_CHAIN_CODE' AND flv.lookup_code = xca3.sales_chain_code -- 販売先チェーンコード AND flv.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND NVL(flv.start_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) <= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND NVL(flv.end_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) >= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND flv.attribute3 IN ( SELECT xx4.work_base_code FROM (SELECT xev1.work_base_code_new work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev1 WHERE xev1.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev1.issue_date <= TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') UNION ALL SELECT xev2.work_base_code_old work_base_code FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev2 WHERE xev2.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev2.issue_date > TO_CHAR(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date,'YYYYMMDD') ) xx4 ) ) AND (xcasv.customer_class_code = '10' OR xcasv.customer_class_code IS NULL) AND (xcasv.business_low_type IS NULL OR xcasv.business_low_type IN ( SELECT flvv2.lookup_code FROM fnd_lookup_values_vl flvv1 ,fnd_lookup_values_vl flvv2 WHERE flvv1.lookup_type = 'XXCMM_CUST_GYOTAI_SHO' AND flvv1.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND NVL(flvv1.start_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) <= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND NVL(flvv1.end_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) >= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND flvv2.lookup_type = 'XXCSO1_SP_CATEGORY' AND flvv2.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND NVL(flvv2.start_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) <= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND NVL(flvv2.end_date_active, TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date)) >= TRUNC(xxccp_common_pkg2.get_process_date) AND flvv2.lookup_code = flvv1.lookup_code ) )
